children.value: A modal panel that pops up at the bottom, containing multiple options related to the current situation.
The action panel defines options through the
attribute is an array composed of objects. Each object in the array is configured with a column. For the object format, see the table at the bottom of the document.
// By default, options will not automatically collapse when clicked
// Automatic collapse can be enabled through the close-on-click-action attribute
property, a cancel button will be displayed at the bottom. After clicking, the current panel will be closed and the
The description information can be displayed at the top of the menu through
, and the description information can be displayed to the right of the option text through the

props.code:
<z-action-sheet
   v-model:show="show"
   :actions="actions"
   cancel-text="Cancel"
   description="This is a description message"
   close-on-click-action
/>

children.value: You can set options to the loading state or disabled state through
, or set the color of the option through
The display content of the panel can be customized through the slot, and the title bar can be displayed using the

props.code:
<z-action-sheet v-model:show="showTitle" title="title">
   <view class="demo-action-sheet-content">Content</view>
</z-action-sheet>

<style>
.demo-action-sheet {
   &-content {
     padding: var(--z-padding-md) var(--z-padding-md)
       calc(var(--z-padding-md) * 10);
   }
}
</style>

children.value: Whether to display the action panel
Whether to display the close icon
Close the icon name or image link, which is equivalent to the
animation duration in milliseconds, set to 0 to disable animation
Set the z-index level of the panel to a fixed value
whether to display the mask layer
Whether to close the option after clicking it
Whether to close the overlay after clicking it
Whether to enable bottom safe area adaptation
to prevent closing, support returning Promise
property is an array of objects. Each object in the array is configured with a column. The objects can contain the following values:
Add additional class for the corresponding column
Triggered when an option is clicked, not triggered when disabled or loaded
Triggered when the cancel button is clicked
Triggered when the panel is opened
Triggered after the panel is opened and the animation ends
Triggered after the panel is closed and the animation ends
Triggered when the overlay layer is clicked
Customize the display content of the panel
The component provides the following CSS variables, which can be used to customize styles. For usage, please refer to

html .default .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-default);background: var(--shiki-default-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-default-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-default-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-default-text-decoration);}html .dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}html.dark .shiki span {color: var(--shiki-dark);background: var(--shiki-dark-bg);font-style: var(--shiki-dark-font-style);font-weight: var(--shiki-dark-font-weight);text-decoration: var(--shiki-dark-text-decoration);}
